articles.author: Daniel Morris
articles.description:
Each year, October 23 is deemed Fallout Day, and this time around, Bethesda is celebrating in style. To kick off celebrations, the developer has made its multiplayer prequel free-to-play for a limited time.


It's fair to say that Fallout 76's 2018 launch was nothing short of a disaster. Controversy after controversy marred the release of what should have been an exciting period for the franchise. A multiplayer Fallout game - what could possibly go wrong? As it turns out, quite a lot, but Bethesda in the years since has released plenty of updates and expansions to make Fallout 76 a worth entry into the franchise.


Image via Bethesda


Fallout 76 goes free-to-play until October 29


You've got until October 29 to try Fallout 76 for free across Xbox, PlayStation, and PC, after which it will become pay-to-play again. This should be plenty of time for you to decide whether Bethesda's multiplayer open world is for you.




Throughout Fallout 76's free-to-play period, the game is available at a steep 75% discount on all platforms, bringing it down to just $9.99. If you've sat on the fence about trying Fallout 76 over the last few years, now's a great time to take the plunge.



The post PSA: Fallout 76 is free-to-play, but not for long appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: PSA: Fallout 76 is free-to-play, but not for long

articles.author: Nebojsa Prijic
articles.description:
One of the most interesting segments of Grand Piece Online is trading. It can often be chaotic, with items changing value almost daily. You'll need to learn more about item values to maximize your chances of getting the most out of them. This GPO trade value items tier list will help you become the ultimate trader.


Table of Contents
Grand Piece Online Trading Value List - Best GPO Items Ranked
How to Evaluate Trade Items in Grand Piece Online (GPO)
Where to Trade in Grand Piece Online

To get the best value for items you wish to trade, look at the official GPO trade value list below to better understand the item's worth on the market. While this represents the official item values, it doesn't mea…
articles.title: GPO Trade Value Items Tier List [Update 11] – Grand Piece Online

articles.author: Martin Ortiz
articles.description:
If there’s one thing that every Fallout game has taught us, it’s that humans never learn their lesson. As if Earth needed to endure any more nuclear explosions, Fallout 76 allows players to launch nukes of their own and even encourages them to do so. 


While obtaining pre-war nuclear launch codes was a privilege only a few in the world had, the post-apocalyptic wasteland hands out codes as if they were phone numbers. If you're looking to leave a radioactive scar upon Earth yourself, you're gonna need to know what Nuke Codes are currently active.


Currently active Fallout 76 Nuke Codes:




Alpha: 
544 03 282




Bravo: 
069 79 747




Charlie: 
411 85 730




Nuke Codes reset every Sunday at 5pm PT / 8pm ET / Monday 12am UTC



What are Nukes Codes used for in Fallout 76?


Screenshot by…
articles.title: Fallout 76 Nuke Codes this week, including launch site locations

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
With the release of Update 1 for Anime Vanguards, there's several new units making a big splash in the meta of the tower defense game on Roblox. One of those units is Julias, who evolves into Julias (Eisplosion). Here is how to get Julias and evolve him into Julias (Eisplosion) in the Anime Vanguards Update 1.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to get Julias


The only way you can obtain Julias in Update 1 of Anime Vanguards is by purchasing and then reaching Level 25 on Battle Pass 2, the Battle Pass currently active during Update 1. That is the only way Julias can be obtained as he is an Exclusive rarity unit, meaning he cannot currently be obtained via Summon or any other method other than via the Battle Pass.


You can acquire the Premium Battle Pass in Anime Vanguards for 799 Robux. Yo…
articles.title: How to get and Evolve Julias in Anime Vanguards [UPDATE 1]

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
Knocking enemies out is a big part of the Assassin's Creed Odyssey: Fate of Atlantis DLC (I won't spoil exactly why here), and odds are a lot of you are coming out of a lengthy hiatus, having completely forgotten how to do the job. 


We'll help you achieve this feat with our detailed Assassin's Creed Odyssey Atlantis DLC guide.


How do you knock people out in Assassin's Creed Odyssey's Atlantis DLC?


As an assassin, it's pretty easy to eliminate enemies with your diverse array of weaponry. However, what does prove to be challenging is the technique of taking them down without killing them. To help with this maneuver, here are a few ways you can knock people out in Assassin's Creed Odyssey:



Unequip your weapons and use your fists


Paralyzing arrows


Sneak attack


Sparta Kick abilit…
articles.title: Guide: How to knock people out for Assassin’s Creed Odyssey’s Atlantis DLC

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Since Sonic x Shadow Generations is the latest game in the Blue Blur’s franchise, we all need to know: is there a Chao Garden? Are we finally able to relive the early 2000s and raise our ultimate life form?


We’ll tell you all we know below.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Does Sonic x Shadow Generations have Chao Garden?


Unfortunately, Sonic x Shadow Generations does not have a Chao Garden. Even if there are so many references to the Sonic Adventure games from the Dreamcast and Gamecube era, there is no sign of that being anywhere.


That being said, the closest you’ll get to in terms of Chao in Sonic x Shadow Generations will be collecting them in all of Sonic’s levels. 


They’re collectible in the same fashion as you’d collect the red star rings in each level, except there are only three per Act. In total, there are 54 different Chao to collect.


Screenshot by Destructoid


What is the point of the Chao in Sonic’s levels?


The Chao being added to the Sonic Generations portion of the game just adds additional padding. They’re another set of collectibles for those who know all or most of the locations of the Red Rings.


Collecting all 54 will also not unlock the Garden as a result. It’s simply tied to the “Rescue Professional” achievement or trophy. 


However, what’s cool about the Chao is that once you collect them, you can get a more detailed look at them. They’re all different in appearance and reference all different types you may have seen in the past. 


There are Hero and Dark Chao that spawn in set areas, all in different colors, patterns, and even with some accessories. You can find one with a cracked egg as a helmet in Chemical Plant Act 1 which is an obvious reference to the head accessories they can put on in the Sonic Adventure games.

The post Does Sonic x Shadow Generations have Chao Garden? Explained appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Does Sonic x Shadow Generations have Chao Garden? Explained

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
The final chapter of Lana Lore takes you on an explorative journey inside a labyrinth. You must find a way out of this treacherous place to stop the demon before you. Here's how to escape the maze in Dress to Impress Lana Lore Chapter 3.


How to navigate the maze in Dress to Impress: Lana Lore Chapter 3 (DTI)


Chapter 3's maze features four types of traps across the map. You'll initially encounter rising or dropping spikes from the ground, damaging half of your heart health. Some scythes will also drop down, along with various spiky logs. It's best to jump whenever you encounter these traps to keep your health intact.


For added assistance, the faint red lines on the ground can serve as a reliable guide. While they may be difficult to spot, you can lower your quality via Settings to get…
articles.title: How to escape the maze in Dress to Impress: Lana Lore Chapter 3

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
MMORPGs are no strangers to seasonal events, and it seems that the recently released Throne and Liberty from NCSoft and Amazon Games is no exception. From October 24, Halloween will very much come to Solisium. 


The Haunted Harvest event is set to run from October 24 until November 13, so you’ll have plenty of time to dive in and experience absolutely everything on offer. Here’s the official trailer for the event:




The sheer amount of Halloween-themed things on display in the trailer can be a little overwhelming, but don’t worry, let’s take a look at everything that will be available to try during the Haunted Harvest event. 


Get scared by event duties and tasks


Image via NCSoft


It is an event-only Dungeon, home to a giant Jack-o’-lantern with murderous intentions. In the trailer,…
articles.title: Throne and Liberty: Spooktacular Halloween event, Haunted Harvest, begins October 24

articles.author: Christian Markle
articles.description:
DAN DA DAN has quickly emerged as one of the most captivating anime of the Fall 2024 season with its unique blend of humor, supernatural themes, and intense action. The series doesn’t shy away from incorporating real-world paranormal folklore, cleverly transforming well-known legends into vivid, larger-than-life antagonists. For instance, the Serpo Aliens that abducted Momo Ayase. 


But like other entities featured in the anime, these aliens aren’t merely the product of creative fiction. They are inspired by a real-world conspiracy theory.


Screenshot via Muse Asia YouTube


Serpo Aliens in DAN DA DAN


The Serpo Aliens in DAN DA DAN is an all-male species that reproduces via cloning, resulting in a singular genetic make-up. Their original form is a slug-like humanoid with prominent lips…
articles.title: Real-world origin of Serpo Aliens featured in DAN DA DAN

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cox Communications is fighting a writ of certiorari filed by several record labels at the U.S. Supreme Court. The music companies argue that ISPs can be held vicariously liable for pirating subscribers, even when they don't directly profit from this activity. Cox argues that this "radical new theory" would make ISPs liable for virtually anything their users do online.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox Asks Supreme Court to Reject Record Labels’ Petition over ISPs ‘Piracy Profits’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Seattle Seahawks cornerback Tariq Woolen, who reportedly earns over $1 million a year, used pirate streaming site MethStreams to watch his own team play. This revelation came from Woolen's Instagram story, where he shared an image clearly displaying the site's URL. While Woolen seemed unconcerned when the news reached him, the NFL, which actively combats piracy, will likely take a different view.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: NFL Player Uses Pirate Streaming Site to Watch His Own Team

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After Italy's Piracy Shield system blocked Google Drive last weekend, telecoms regulator AGCOM says that if Google had fully collaborated in the fight against piracy, the disruption could've been easily avoided. Meanwhile, an expert has raised the alarm over Piracy Shield's security, warning that nobody knows whether a bad actor has infiltrated the platform. Google Drive today, but will it be trains, hospitals, and government infrastructure tomorrow?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Victim Blamed For Piracy Shield Blunder, Warning Over Infiltration Risk

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Polish streaming service CDA has once again been accused of being a notorious piracy market by the Motion Picture Association (MPA). CDA sent a rebuttal to the US government, dismissing the claims as false and misleading. In addition, the company points out that the MPA was provided with a direct takedown tool but has never used it.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MPA’s Piracy Claims are ‘False’ and ‘Misleading’, Streaming Platform Says

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Alien: Romulus' tops the chart, followed by 'Deadpool & Wolverine'. 'The Wild Robot' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 10/21/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After blocking Cloudflare to prevent IPTV piracy just a few months ago, on Saturday the rightsholders behind Piracy Shield ordered Italy's ISPs to block Google Drive. The subsequent nationwide blackout, affecting millions of Italians, wasn't just a hapless IP address blunder. This was the reckless blocking of a Google.com subdomain that many 10-year-olds could identify as being important. Reckless people and internet infrastructure, what could possibly go wrong next?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Drive Blackout in Italy After Another Major Anti-Piracy Blunder

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The ESA, which represents several major gaming companies, has shared an updated list of notorious piracy threats with the U.S. Government. One of the notable newcomers is FitGirl-Repacks, which has been a dominant player in the game piracy landscape for years. Meanwhile, ESA's report no longer mentions malware, cryptocurrencies, or Scene release groups, which were previously seen as 'growing trends'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Game Companies List ‘FitGirl-Repacks’ as a Key Piracy Threat

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Court of Rome has ordered Cloudflare to take action against one of its customers, pirate streaming site 'Guardaserie'. Cloudflare is required to disconnect the site and block related domain names, including those that are registered in the future. In addition, the company must share information that can help to identify the operator. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Orders Cloudflare to Block and Identify ‘Pirate Site’ Customer

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The Court of Justice of the European Union has handed a historic victory to Datel, the company behind video game cheat device Action Replay. For well over a decade, Sony argued that modification of game generated code amounted to copyright infringement. The CJEU judgment holds that there was no violation of Sony's rights, since Action Replay ran alongside Sony's game code, only modifying values in RAM while leaving object code untouched.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sony Loses as CJEU Rules Datel’s RAM Data ‘Cheat’ Non-Copyright Infringing

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy is suffering downtime again today. While the site no longer spooks its visitors with cryptic messages, the repeated issues are somewhat unusual. TorrentGalaxy reportedly changed owners, which could partly explain the recent troubles. This is another chapter in the unusual history of the site, which originated in the 1337x chatbox after ExtraTorrent shut down.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy Has a Rough Start Under New Owners

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
City of London Police say a man was arrested this week as part of an operation to disrupt the supply of pirate IPTV subscriptions in the UK. After targeting a residential address and four business addresses in the West Midlands, police say a 38-year-old man was detained on suspicion of copyright and money laundering offenses. Police also shared photos taken during the operation, a relative rarity these days but a welcome source of additional information nonetheless.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Server Shut Down as City of London Police Target UK ‘Bulk Seller’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A lawsuit filed at a Seattle court this week targets Ukraine-based hosting Provider Virtual Systems. Coordinated by the International Broadcaster Coalition Against Piracy (IBCAP), the lawsuit focuses on Virtual Systems' self-promotion as a 'DMCA-ignored' host. After allegedly ignoring over 500 DMCA-style infringement notices relating to dozens of pirate IPTV services, the lawsuit demands over $42m in copyright damages.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: IPTV Piracy Lawsuit Targets ‘DMCA Ignored’ Host in $42M Lawsuit

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Korean game publisher Nexon is using the U.S. legal system to address online copyright infringement. The company obtained a DMCA subpoena that requires Discord to hand over the personal details of suspected pirates. While Discord has shared information in the past, it doesn't plan to cooperate any longer, refusing to play the role of 'anti-piracy police'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Discord Disputes DMCA Subpoena, Rejects Role as ‘Anti-Piracy’ Partner

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After the world's largest streaming piracy network was shut down in Vietnam recently, sites like FMovies, 123Movies, and Soap2Day should in theory be a thing of the past. Yet as recent MPA blocking measures in the UK show, that's far from reality. Hundreds of domains with similar branding are scooping up millions of visitors, but who operates them and from where, is currently unknown.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: After Historic Win, MPA Battles Endless FMovies, Soap2Day & 123Movie Clones

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Two book authors are asking a U.S. federal court to enforce a $1.4 million piracy judgment against Cloudflare. A Moldovan court previously ruled that Cloudflare is liable as it failed to block access to a pirated book offered though one of its customers. The company has yet to pay these damages. The case can have broad implications, but it's uncertain if the U.S. court will indeed validate the Moldovan order.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Rightsholders Seek U.S. Help to Collect $1.4 Million Piracy Judgment Against Cloudflare

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After pleading guilty to several charges in connection with the sale of pirate IPTV subscriptions, last Friday a man and a woman were sentenced at a court in Northern Ireland. With estimated profits of £475,000, across four years of offending, the man was sentenced to two years' prison and a further two on license, the Federation Against Copyright Theft reports. Is that sentence too long, or not long enough? That could depend on relevant information that FACT isn't reporting.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Why a Pirate IPTV Seller’s 4-Year Prison Sentence Means Little Without Context

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italy's Piracy Shield blocking system was launched early 2024 promising to end the flood of pirate IPTV providers saturating the local market. Site-blocking proponents' claims of huge success were met by reports of significant failures. In the absence of any useful, credible data being made available by those behind Piracy Shield, researchers in Italy are trying to answer the big question: Is Piracy Shield effective at reducing access to pirated live sports streams?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield May Reduce Illegal Sports Streaming, Traffic Analysis Suggests

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
With many millions of regular visitors, Cuevana.biz is one of the largest pirate streaming sites in Latin America. However, the site may not be around for much longer. A notice posted by the operators, who claim to be Mexican students, suggests that they will voluntarily hand over their domains to the MPA, which recently reported the site to the U.S. government.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cuevana Announces Voluntary Shutdown Following MPA Pressure

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The RIAA has submitted its most recent overview of notorious markets to the U.S. Trade Representative, listing familiar suspects including torrent sites, cyberlockers, and stream-ripping services. The RIAA views artificial intelligence as a potential threat, but also as a source for new revenue streams and innovation. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: RIAA’s Flags Latest Piracy Threats, Sees a Future for AI

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (jibbodahibbo, Bosca)
articles.description:
Backyard Basketball, is finally ready to come off the bench for some sweet public testing! You can now play again on ScummVM this beloved Backyard Sports title (not to mention the last unsupported game on the SCUMM engine). Play with the Backyard Kids and even create five of your own! This game also features (now former) NBA and WNBA stars Kevin Garnett and Lisa Leslie!
Much like the other sports titles of this franchise, controls are point-and-click by default, with gamepad and keyboard options. Pick your favorite kids and play some 3 on 3 basketball. Don't forget your 110% Juice or Dunking Donut for a slamma jamma! Pass that ball in, listen to the live commentary from Sunny Day and Barry DeJay and shoot some jumpers on your way to a championship.
Are you ready to play? Dig up your good old CD and fire up the latest daily build!
>
articles.title: “What Time is it? GAME TIME HOO!”

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Mylně jsem se domníval, že jdu na film o problematice eutanázie. Ale místo toho Toltékové, astrální cestování, život po životě, reinkarnace a Jaroslav Dušek. Hodně podobné jako "Tajemství a smysl života", ale o něco méně WTF a výrazně kratší. Každopádně velmi fádní a nudné, pokud od začátku nevěříte tomu, co je vám cpáno. (Ilča 20 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Tajemství smrti - 30 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Zdaleka nelepší černobílé drama o íránských džudistkách v Gruzii, jaké jsem v životě viděl. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Tatami - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Film, ve kterém většinu času není vůbec jasné, jaká je zrovna motivace které postavy na plátně (např. jestli právě dělá vtip, nebo jestli se bojí o svůj život). To je jeho největší a soustavný problém, ale má i mnoho dalších, například arabské teroristy z "Návratu do budoucnosti" a pointu, spočívající v tom, že veřejnoprávní média vám non-stop lžou a vy jim to štastně žerete (což je pointa pravděpodobně nezamýšlená, protože film spoluprodukoval Český rozhlas). Je velmi smutné vidět dílo, na kterém pracovali lidi, o kterých víme, že jsou schopni vyprodukovat něco zajímavého, a výsledek dopadl takto strašlivě. (Ilča 10 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Výjimečný stav - 20 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Není to kvalitní film, ale je šílený a není nudný ani rutinní. Je to výpověď o tom, co si Coppola na stará kolena myslí o světě a o filmařině - a taková výpověď mě zajímá. Ale kdyby to přesně stejně natočil 25letý absolvent filmové akademie, měl bych z toho jen legraci a vysmíval bych se jeho neschopnosti. (Ilča 60%)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Megalopolis - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Kdybych teoreticky měl pěti- až osmileté dítě, hrozně bych chtěl, aby se mu tenhle film líbil. Kdyby mu bylo 10 nebo 12 let, už bych mu nepouštěl tohle, ale první Bayovy Transformers. Je to fajn, ale je to opravdu jen a pouze pro děti. A navíc, viděl jsem dabovanou verzi a rozhodně byla méně zábavná než tři minuty ukázek v původním znění, které jsem viděl taky. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Transformers Jedna [Transformers One] - 50 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Prvních 30 minut psychologická sci-fi, posledních 30 minut absurdní groteska. A z jednoho do druhého se to překlopí velmi nápaditě, promyšleně a zvolna. Představte si "Evil Dead 2" nebo "Braindead", ale pro současného diváka a s nějakou tou myšlenkou navíc. Všichni zúčastnění zaslouží pochvalu, protože  tento projekt velmi snadno mohl dopadnout hrozně. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Substance [The Substance] - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Dnes pokec (s Jakubem Červinkou) o epické videohře, kterou byste si neměli nechat ujít, a jejíž jediným problémem je, že má příliš pomalý rozjezd. Tento podcast je výjimečně k dispozici také na YouTube.
articles.title: Videohra: Warframe - 100 % (Host: Jakub Červinka)

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Hodně mi to připomnělo "On se bojí" nebo filmy Charlieho Kaufmana. "Jiný člověk" je ale "tlumenější" a první půlhodinu vypadá skoro jako normální film, který možná není úplně podařeně natočený. Teprve pak to začne být opravdu divné a vyjde najevo, že to od počátku všechno byl sofistikovaný plán filmařů a že tím asi chtěli něco říct. (Ilča 70 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Jiný člověk [A Different Man] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Výtvarně nádherné, ale jinak... Jako kdyby si v DreamWorks řekli "VALL-I, Železný obr a Laputa byly fajn, ale moc sofistikované. Pojďme natočit něco pro NORMÁLNÍ děti!" A to je škoda, protože tenhle film si klade potenciálně velmi zajímavé otázky, ale většinu z nich ignoruje na úkor roztomilých zvířátek a ujetého robota. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Rozzum v divočině [The Wild Robot] - 70 %
